III.ii.2.E.3.c
.
Address Codes for X-Ray Records
To request Army x-ray records, use address code 75 for entrance and separation x-rays.
Note
: Â In-service interim x-rays, if available, are accessed via the Joint Longitudinal Viewer (JLV).
title: M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section E - Service Record Address Codes and Addresses for Military Records Centers and Other Agencies
citation: Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section E
